name: Eletrion ReAlpha
description:
Introduction:

Hello! Welcome to the topic of my game, Eletrion ReAlpha, before explaining better about the game I need to talk about what is the Atompunk genre, because a good part of the ReAlpha universes are Atompunk. Atompunk is a sub-genre of the science fiction that portrays a past where present and future technologies happened earlier, but then you think “Oh, but that’s not called Atompunk, it’s called Steampunk” not exactly. While Steampunk is set in the XIX century, the Atompunk is set in the middle of the XX century (1945 – 1965). A good game that exemplifies what is Atompunk is Fallout 4. I making the game on the RPG Maker VX Ace with some friends, the game have a good feedback in the Brazil and now i am talking about him in the international community.

Synopsis:

Control Richardison James. A robot that has a great mission to find a hero known by the nickname of “Tsirhc Ahddub”. For this he will need to follow a dangerous journey, facing simple suckers to great war generals and dictators, all of this to find the great hero and save the multiverse from the evil Rotcin. In his journey he will have help from his friends, UGR100, João Almeida, Izi Almeida, Marcia Andrade and the all-knowing cat Eletrion.

Features:

NPCs and Enemies with their own individualities.
Chests and containers with randomly generated items.
Graphics inspired by the Mother franchise (Earthbound).
Each object has a description.

Advices:

The actual demo is a old version, very different from the screenshots version and is in portuguese...
